contentLeft: It is an MA tool that allows you to approach anonymous potential customers .
contentRight1: “SATORI” is a domestic marketing automation tool (MA tool) that can create contact not only with “prospective customers whose names you know” but also with “anonymous prospective customers”.
contentRight2: We will understand the behavior history on the website, discover prospective customers with high interest, and inform the person in charge of the optimal timing to approach them.
